articles.description: The race to manufacture Apple iPhones is heating up with Tata Group in talks with Taiwanese electronics giant Wistron to set up a joint venture.
articles.content: In a boost to electronics manufacturing in India, Vedanta will set up a hub to manufacture Apple iPhones and other television equipment in Maharashtra, Reuters quoted from an interview given by chair… [+1138 chars]

articles.author: Roshni Agarwal
articles.title: SBI m-cap hits Rs 5 lakh crore mark as shares scale fresh record high - Economic Times
articles.description: The sharp rally in public sector lender's shares drove its market-cap (m-cap) past the Rs 5 lakh crore mark. As of 11:50 am, it was commanding a market cap of Rs 5.03 lakh crore. The lender is placed at the seventh position in the overall m-cap ranking.
articles.content:
Shares of rallied close to 3 per cent to hit record high of Rs 574.7 per share on NSE in Wednesday's trade. Meanwhile, on BSE, the scrip marked a new all-time high of Rs 574.65 apiece.
The sharp ral… [+1225 chars]
